com.apriori.concurrent

Interface RunnableCompletionStageFuture<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the future value
    All Superinterfaces:
    CompletionStage<T>, CompletionStageFuture<T>, Future<T>, Runnable, RunnableFuture<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RunnableCompletableFuture, RunnableReadOnlyCompletableFuture

    public interface RunnableCompletionStageFuture<T>
extends RunnableFuture<T>, CompletionStageFuture<T>
    A combination of RunnableFuture and CompletionStageFuture.
